description: Serpentkin Scouts are agile and cunning creatures with a snake-like lower body and humanoid upper body. They serve as scouts and spies for larger serpentkin clans, using their stealth and speed to gather information and strike quickly when needed.

traits.name: Snake Body
traits.description: The Serpentkin Scout can move through small spaces as if it were one size smaller.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: The Serpentkin Scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Serpentkin Scout makes two attacks with its scimitar or shortbow.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
